Nightlight::

"How can you live without a spark??"asked Nightlight "Who create you 
if we can know?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Vampirtron:
>      He followed Rodimus down the corridor, "As my name suggests I 
am a vampire, like the old human myths. Made true by transformer 
technology. I feed on energon, and need a fresh supply to keep me in 
working order. I don't know if pure energon will do, my creators 
never tested it on me, I was made to kill. Another thing about 
vampire's, they aren't alive, it's just a dead body. That's what I 
am, a dead body. I have no spark. Which is why I need Transformer 
juice to live. I hate it, I have never liked feeding on other 
Transformers, and I wish I could find a way to change me. Well, there 
it is, I've never told anyone, and now I have. What do you think, 
Rodimus?"
>   RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote: ::Rodimus Prime:: He turns to 
the new arrivals. "He is dead Condor, killed by the Predacon's. He 
named me Commander." He then talks to Vampirtron, "Welcome to the 
Maximals. I would love to hear everything you have to say..." Rodimus 
stop thinking of all that he has to do at this time, and how he'll 
work it. "Would you and Nighlight please tell me as we walk to my 
office. Someone is waiting there for a meeting. I'll hear all on the 
way." He turns to Ragnar. "I'd like to stay and watch the fight but I 
seem to have two meeting currently. Please inform me of the results." 
Rodimus starts to walk too his office. "Come along Vampirtron, 
Nightlight."
